Charles H. Dugan

  1. Foster Name: Charlie
  2. Foster Family: John Ryan
  3. Location of Family: Oakdale, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Oakdale, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1898-12-05
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Crossroads April 1992, p. 3; A Part of History: An Orphan Train Rider (n.p.); National Orphan Train Complex.
